    • Uses of AnisotropicDiffusion.ConductionCoefficientFunction in org.openimaj.image.processing.algorithm

      Classes in org.openimaj.image.processing.algorithm that implement AnisotropicDiffusion.ConductionCoefficientFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AnisotropicDiffusion.HighConstrastEdgeFunction
      The first conduction function proposed by Perona & Malik, that privileges high contrast edges over low constrast ones.
      static class  AnisotropicDiffusion.WideRegionFunction
      The second conduction function proposed by Perona & Malik, that privileges wider regions over smaller ones.
